name: unable
content:
be unable to do something
Add to word list
Add to word list
B1 to not be able to do something: We were unable to contact him at the time.
More examplesFewer examplesWe were unable to get funding and therefore had to abandon the project.She's been unable to play since January because of a torn calf muscle.It's a tragedy that so many young people are unable to find jobs.We regret that at the present time we are unable to supply the goods you ordered.Experts seem unable to agree whether the drug is safe or not.
